Professional Food and Beverage Management

This module offers a specialized journey into Professional Food and Beverage Management, with a focus on the 5* segment. It delves into the art and precision of advanced service techniques, starting from sophisticated table artistry to the orchestration of high-end dining experiences. The curriculum includes detailed studies in beverage connoisseurship, guest engagement strategies, and service leadership. Emphasizing the nuances of luxury hospitality, the module prepares students to excel in high-pressure, elite service environments, culminating in a capstone project that showcases their mastery in delivering top-tier hospitality experiences.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Demonstrate mastery in advanced food and beverage management techniques specific to the 5* hospitality sector.

+  Develop strategic planning and execution skills for high-end hospitality service, including customer experience enhancement and problem- solving in dynamic service scenarios.

+  Apply sustainability and ethical practices in 5* food and beverage service, balancing guest satisfaction with environmental and social responsibility.
